entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 20 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 45 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 80 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING SOUTHWEST AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING

CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
